navbar.text: Korean Language and TOPIK Study Center in Tashkent

header.text1: Opportunity to Study at South Korean Universities with up to 100% Scholarship
header.text2: We Help You Achieve Up to Level 6 in TOPIK in 5 Months
header.text3: Achieve a High Level in TOPIK and Get the Opportunity to Study and Work in South Korea
header.text4: Sign Up for a Free Lesson
header.text5: Sign Up for the First Lesson for Free!

about.text0: TOPIK academy is exactly for you if you:
about.text: Want to start speaking Korean in a short time
about.text1: Want to learn Korean and build your career
about.text2: Want to get a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship to prestigious universities in Korea
about.text3: Plan to go to South Korea for study and work
about.text4: Know Korean at an intermediate level and want to improve it
about.text5: Have been studying for many years without achieving results

modal.text1: Leave your details to reserve a spot for a free lesson, and we will contact you soon

result.text: Our students' results up to TOPIK 6

grant.text: Opportunity to win up to 100% scholarship at Korean Universities
grant.text3: The South Korean government's scholarship program (GKS) under the National Institute for International Education of Korea provides
grant.text5: students the opportunity to study undergraduate and graduate programs in Korea
grant.text8: What the GKS scholarship offers you
grant.text9: Travel expenses to Korea at the beginning and end of the program are covered. Upon arrival in Korea, a one-time payment for settling in is provided. Amount - 200,000 Korean won (approximately 157 USD). Language course and university tuition fees are fully covered (only for master's and doctoral students)...

registr.text: Register for a course that suits you
registr.text2: Intensive course for those who want to master the Korean language deeply, 6 days a week for 1.5 hours.
registr.text5: Standard Korean language lessons, 3 days a week for 1.5 hours.
registr.text8: Classes 3 times a week for 1.5 hours for those who want to take individual lessons with a teacher.

info.text2: You will be taught by teachers with over 4 years of experience and a Topik level of 6
info.text4: We have free coworking zones for flexible studying, networking, and self-improvement
info.text6: The TOPIK academy team regularly organizes additional events for its students
info.text8: During regular trial exams, you can assess your level
info.text10: If you face difficulties in mastering the material, your curator will assist you
info.text12: We help our successfully graduated students with obtaining visas, selecting universities, and winning scholarships for studying in South Korea

ques.text: Do you have any questions left?
ques.text1: Leave your details, and we will contact you to answer all your questions.
